item.description:
Learn about advaita vedanta, a way of seeing the deeper truth of who we are that is inherently peaceful, connected, vibrant yet content. Enjoy the ego, yet let go of the suffering of over identifying with it. The spiritual teachers have taught this for thousands of years - the truer light of consciousness. Hear the truth of that knowing and learn and practice down-to-earth ways to live and experience this. Learn from Herb's experience of living a life with spiritual commitment as a priority, letting go of suffering, and enjoying both the life of the ego and the deeper joys beyond the ego.

Macrobiotic lunch for $15 extra from noon to 1

10am-4pm, $50, sliding scale to $30

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert with over 20 years experience teaching personality types workshops He is a relationship counselor and coach, working with individuals, couples and families, leads trainings in organizations and gives presentations and workshops throughout the world.
